info.title: DocuSign
info.description: DocuSign helps organizations connect and automate how they prepare, sign, act on, and manage agreements. Today, more than half a million customers and hundreds of millions of users in over 180 countries use DocuSign to accelerate the process of doing business and to simplify people's lives. Connect to DocuSign to manage and automate your system of agreement.

x-ms-docs.description: Streamline document signing and on-boarding processes

post.description: Triggers a new flow when an envelope status changes.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, send an envelope.

parameters.name: certificate
parameters.description: When set to false, the envelope signing certificate is removed from the download.

get.description: Triggers a new flow when an envelope status changes.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, change the status of an envelope.

post.description: Send a new envelope using a specified template.

get.description: List recipients for a specific envelope.
List templates for a specific account.
List folders for a specific account.
List envelopes under a particular folder.

get.summary: Get the signers of a template in dynamic schema format
get.description: Get the signers of a template in dynamic schema format.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account to get the signers for.

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: Template to get the signers for.

customFields.description: Key-value pairs representing the custom fields for this envelope (where key is the field name, and value is the field value).

tabs.description: Key-value pairs representing the tabs for this recipient (where key is the field name, and value is the field value).

DynamicSigners.description: An object that represents signers based on a template.

routingOrder.description: The signing order of the recipient in the document.

documentsUri.description: The URI for the document in DocuSign.

envelopeUri.description: The URI for the envelope in DocuSign.

recipientsUri.description: The URI for the recipients of the envelope in DocuSign.

statusDateTime.description: The datetime the status was set.

uri.description: The URI for the envelope in DocuSign.

routingOrder.description: The signing order of the recipient in the document.

envelopeDocuments.description: The documents attached to the envelope.
